amendment.description: Amendment requires USDA to continue to make section 502 housing loans for properties in the Pine View West Subdivision of Gibsonville, NC, notwithstanding the subdivision's redesignation from a rural area to a metropolitan area.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 46 in the Congressional Record of July 17, 1995, to require the Secretary of USDA to continue to make Section 502 housing loans for properties in the Pine View West Subdivision of Gibsonville, NC, notwithstanding the subdivision's redesignation from a rural area to a metropolitan area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
